document.full_text: chinese computer maker lenovo group ltd's has agreed to buy german electronics retailer medion ag for around $900 million, boosting its market share in europe.
document.title: lenovo buys german computer seller medion for $900 million
lines_and_colors: chinese computer maker lenovo group ltd's has agreed to buy german electronics retailer medion ag for around $900 million, boosting its market share in europe.
